description:
Play solo, with friends or online multiplayer

The classic dice game is entering a new dimension, now with the new online multiplayer mode!
In Yatzi 2, you are no longer just the couch champion, you can now compete against other enthusiasts from all over the world. New game environments bring fresh excitement, while the popular gameplay remains as thrilling as ever: Roll the dice, enter the score, celebrate and have fun together!

• Play online with family, friends or randomly selected opponents worldwide.
• Single and multiplayer modes for up to 6 players.
• 7 diverse game worlds.
• With smart game help for beginners.
• Fun for all ages.
